channel.title: Trying to get java recognizable on windows 7...?
channel.description: Hello, I'm trying to get java to be recognizable on windows 7, like with the system environmental variables. I would appreciate it if you would post the jdk, jre, etc links for me. And also, It says in the classpath things on the internet on other tutorials that the classpath and path should be like C:/program files. well i have java downloaded into program files (x86). Any help? Greatly appreciated!
